txt.en: Éowyn can be found outside Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nÉowyn has asked you to ride with her to Entwade to combat the White Hand forces. You should speak to her when you are ready.

'You fought well, friend.

'I regret that the people of Entwade could not be saved, but we have done all we can for them. The White Hand shall not soon forget the victory we won today!

'If you are to remain in Edoras, I have many other matters to share with you.'
Éowyn can be found outside Meduseld in Edoras.\n\nYou have bested the White Hand at Entwade and returned to Edoras. You should speak to Éowyn.

'We must right this wrong as best we can, [placeholder].

'The people of Entwade did not deserve such a fate, and so shallow is the honour of the Uruks that they press their attack still. They will not find victory at the Wade, for we will be there to meet them!

'Come! Let us ride!'
Hoping to cut down the White Hand invaders once and for all, Éowyn rides to Entwade with vengeance in her heart.
Talk to Éowyn and defend Entwade
'We have little time to lose! Are you ready to ride to Entwade?'
